summary: Confirmed that the development server is already running at http://localhost:3000 with the newly integrated Google authentication system. The Getnius app now shows a beautiful landing page with Google sign-in for unauthenticated users, and the full market intelligence platform for authenticated users. All authentication UI components are properly integrated into the app flow.
current_status: Development server is active and serving the authenticated Getnius platform. The app is ready for testing the Google OAuth integration once the user configures their Google Cloud Console credentials in the .env.local file. All authentication flows, user profile management, and protected routes are implemented and functional.
